name: Endless Crusade (itch)
description:
Story;

You have been assigned to be on an eternal crusade to cleanse the land of evil. If any evil passes you, you shall lose honor; lose all your honor or if you get hit, you lose.

It is basically an endless runner except instead of dodging most of the time, you need to destroy every living and unliving thing that crosses your path.

Progression

As the days pass, the game gets slightly more difficult. New enemies and set pieces will randomly appear during each day and night that passes. By the time you reach Day 4 (Night) and beyond, nothing new will appear.

If you consider day and night to be separate levels, there are 7 levels in total (the last level being Day 4 (Day)).

Controls

Keyboard Controls

WASD or Arrow keys Movement Z or J Jump Z or J + S or Down Arrow key Jump Attack S or Down Arrow key Duck TabSwitch between Orthographic and Perspective views
(Needs to be unlocked.) Delete Resets highscore and unlocks Esc Quit

Xbox Gamepad Controls

D-Pad/Left Stick Movement A Jump A + D-Pad/Left Stick (Down) Jump Attack D-Pad/Left Stick (Down) Duck

For more information please refer to the included Readme.
